title: Typophile | The Smaller Picture
content:
The Smaller Picture is back online! For those of you that missed it the first time around, the Smaller Picture is a collaborative typeface designed by the collective community of Typophile, one pixel at a time.   
   
Should the orange pixel be black or white? You decide.   
   
 [http://www.typophile.com/smallerpicture](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234306/http:/www.typophile.com/smallerpicture)
author: Jared Benson

comments.content:
Hopefully, better luck this time around. New overview thumbnails are online for your viewing pleasure.   
   
http://www.typophile.com/smallerpicture
